15 #define SSC_BAUDRATE 115200
16 
17 uint16_t map(YAML::Node servo, std::vector<uint16_t> an_read) {
18 
19  uint16_t in_min = servo["arduino"]["analog_read_min"].as<uint16_t>();
20  uint16_t in_max = servo["arduino"]["analog_read_max"].as<uint16_t>();
21  uint16_t out_min = servo["ssc"]["pulse_min"].as<uint16_t>();
22  uint16_t out_max = servo["ssc"]["pulse_max"].as<uint16_t>();
23  int pin = servo["arduino"]["pin"].as<int>();
24 
25  if (pin > an_read.size())
26  return 0;
27  if ((in_max - in_min) == 0)
28  return 0;
29  uint16_t pulse = (uint16_t) ((an_read[pin] - in_min) * (out_max - out_min)
30  / (in_max - in_min) + out_min);
31 
32  if (pulse > out_max)
33  return out_max;
34  if (pulse < out_min)
35  return out_min;
36  else
37  return pulse;
38 }
39 
40 
41 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
42  std::string ssc_port, input_file, input_config_calib;
43  ROS_FATAL("1");
44  if (argc >= 2) {
45  ssc_port = argv[1];
46  input_config_calib = argv[2];
47  input_file = argv[3];
48  } else {
49  printf("Usage: rosrun pumpkin playback <ssc_port> <input_config_calib> <input_file>\n");
50  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse input files");
51  exit(-1);
52  }
53 
54  ros::init(argc, argv, "playback");
55  ros::NodeHandle nh;
56 
57  YAML::Node pumpkin_config = YAML::LoadFile(input_config_calib);
58 
59  std::vector<YAML::Node> reads = YAML::LoadAllFromFile(input_file);
60  std::vector<YAML::Node> servos;
61  ROS_FATAL("2");
62  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["shoulder_0"]);
63  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["shoulder_1"]);
64  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["shoulder_2"]);
65  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["elbow"]);
66  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["wrist_0"]);
67  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["right_arm"]["wrist_1"]);
68 
69  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["shoulder_0"]);
70  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["shoulder_1"]);
71  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["shoulder_2"]);
72  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["elbow"]);
73  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["wrist_0"]);
74  servos.push_back(pumpkin_config["left_arm"]["wrist_1"]);
75  ROS_FATAL("3");
76  double ros_rate = pumpkin_config["ros_rate"].as<double>();
77  ros::Rate loop_rate(ros_rate);
78  ROS_FATAL("4");
79  serial::Serial ssc(ssc_port, SSC_BAUDRATE, serial::Timeout::simpleTimeout(1000));
80  for (int r = 0; r < reads.size(); r++) {
81  if (!reads[r].IsNull() && ros::ok()){
82  if(reads[r]["an_read"].IsNull()) ROS_FATAL("NULL");
83  std::vector<uint16_t> an_read =
84  reads[r]["an_read"].as<std::vector<uint16_t> >();
85  std::ostringstream stringStream;
86  for (int i = 0; i < reads[r]["an_read"].size(); i++) {
87  uint16_t pulse = map(servos[i], an_read);
88  stringStream << "#" << servos[i]["ssc"]["pin"] << " " << "P" << pulse << " " ;
89  }
90  stringStream << "\r";
91  // Send to ssc
92  ssc.write(stringStream.str());
93  loop_rate.sleep();
94  }
95  }
96  ssc.write("#0 P0 #1 P0 #2 P0 #3 P0 #4 P0 #5 P0 #6 P0 #7 P0 #8 P0 #9 P0 #10 P0 #11 P0 #12 P0 #13 P0 #14 P0 #15 P0\r");
97  ssc.write("#16 P0 #17 P0 #18 P0 #19 P0 #20 P0 #21 P0 #22 P0 #23 P0 #24 P0 #25 P0 #26 P0 #27 P0 #28 P0 #29 P0 #30 P0 #31 P0 #31 P0\r");
98  ssc.close();
99  return 0;
100 }
